name: Horse Survival Simulator 2017
description:
Do you like horses and wild animal simulators? We’ve prepared for you something special – ultimate hoss simulator of this year - Horse Survival Simulator 2017!

Enjoy the cruel world of wild coursers - search forests and plains for food, gather the herd, raise up the foals and feel like the real horse with Horse Survival Simulator 2017!

Explore wilderness as the mature stallion or mare - eat, drink, run to find another horse to make a herd, and to journey together! Meet with other animals and make it the part of your herd -or fight for your life against aggressive predators like wolves, bears, foxes and even snakes! There is no and derby races, but only the wildlife!

Earn points to upgrade and customize your horse as you want – choose the color of skin, mane, raise it health and strength or even buy horses of different breeds, like Percheron or even pony!
Check Horse Survival Simulator 2017 and live the life of a wild trotter exploring this country land, fields, and forests! Stay alive as long as possible and feel the wild spirit!

Horse Survival Simulator 2017 features:

Ultimate wild horse sim
Enjoy beautiful 3D world as your playground
Fight against different hideous predators
Customize and develop your horse as you want

Create your own herd, search for food, fight against other wild animals and have fun with this horse simulator in 3D!
